{
	static int t=0;
	t=t+n/2;

	else

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t){
	cin>>n;
	cout<<n-1<<endl;
	t-=1;
	}
	return 0;
}
